rules_text:
{W}{U} DEFIANCE Fight for another day of freedom with higher mana-value spells.
{U}{B} EVOLUTION The grand evolution demands constant progress from your artifacts.
{B}{R} COUNTERS Your artifacts and creatures adapt piece by piece for victory.
{R}{G} COALITION Expand Dominaria's allied forces with additional colors.
{G}{W} DEFIANCE Take advantage of the counters gained from your force's resistance.
{W}{B} COUNTERS Whether Dominarian or Phyrexian, war asks only for materiel.
{B}{G} GROWTH Your creatures will grow bigger than your opponent's. And those that don't, will grow back.
{G}{U} COALITION Build your forces high and wide with coalition bonuses for using extra colors.
{U}{R} ARTIFACTS Lifeless or merely soulless, your artifacts will carve out victory.
{R}{W} ATTRITION Attack aggressively–Losses on your side merely compound your opponent's misery.
